channel.title: How do i MAKE animations?
channel.description:
Hey guys, im using a 'blank' ish server called
Project Czar v2 Final, Im woundering, i don't think it has ANY animations, so these are my 3 questions
Adding Animations to weps, how do i do it? Adding Animations to attacking, and dieing Npc's? Please Respond ASAP!!
~Tw33zy
(Also, if you know, please can you tell me how to add shops, i don't have a WannaShop!!)
